scripts.zip: cd dist && (minify index.js > index.min.js) && mv index.min.js index.js && zip -j -r bundle.zip index.js ../package.json
scripts.deploy: yarn clear && yarn build && yarn zip && yarn git:clean-tree && yarn tf:apply
scripts.deploy:force: yarn clear && yarn build && yarn zip && yarn tf:apply -replace="yandex_function.entrypoint"
